Class AlbumManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cs301w01.meatload.controllers.AlbumManager

  • public class AlbumManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the Controller logic used for mediating with the AlbumQueryGenerator class.
    Author:
    Blake Bouchard
    See Also:
    AlbumQueryGenerator
